title.rendered: “IDF Intercepts 40 Launches and UAVs from Lebanon: A Night of Tension in Northern Israel”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Following the alerts activated in the northern part of the country a short while ago, about 40 launches were identified crossing from Lebanese territory, some of them were intercepted and the rest fell in open areas, there are no casualties.

Earlier this evening, air defense fighters successfully intercepted two explosive UAVs of the Hezbollah terrorist organization that crossed from Lebanese territory. An alarm for missile and rocket fire in Ramat Naftali was activated due to fear of falling interception debris.

Additionally, several launches that crossed from Lebanese territory to the Ramot Naftali area were identified, there are no casualties.

In recent hours, IDF forces have carried out firing to remove threats in several areas in southern Lebanon.
